VERMILLION
'Nil Radio Network Acceptance Subcommittee
'"Waldo, Abbot, WUOM
Hugh Mix, WhAD
John Regnell, WILL
Gentlemens
I have read the script, "United Nations Tenth
Birthday, UNESCO Gift Coupon Story." The idea of
the gift coupon seems an excellent one to me and
the script, although a trifle contrived, should
be suitable. The committee has my "yes" vote.
Sincerely
EJS/ms
